16 int fun::addition(int n) {
17     int a;
18     a = n + 5;
19     return (a);
20 }
21 
22 void fun::interaction() {
23     int i;
24     cout << "Please enter a number: ";
25     cin >> i;
26     cout << "The value of " << i << " + 5 is " << addition(i) << endl;
27 }
28 
29 void fun::arrayTest() {
30 
31     int ar[5];
32     srand(time(NULL));
33 
34     for (int i = 0; i < 5; i++) {
35         int ranNum = (rand() % 1000) + 1;
36         ar[i] = ranNum;
37     }
38 
39     cout << "This is an array." << endl;
40 
41     for (int i = 0; i < 5; i++) {
42         cout << ar[i] << endl;
43         sleep(1);
44     }
45 }
46 
47 void fun::vec() {
48 
49     string inName;
50     int inNum;
51     getSet g;
52     getSet *tmpGetSet;
53 
54     cout << "This is a vector" << endl;
55 
56     vector<getSet> vec;
57 
58     for (int j = 1; j < 3; j++) {
59 
60         cout << "Please enter a name?" << endl;
61         getline(cin, inName);
62 
63         cout << "Please input a number." << endl;
64         cin >> inNum;
65         cin.ignore();
66 
67         tmpGetSet = new getSet;
68         tmpGetSet->setName(inName);
69         tmpGetSet->setNum(inNum);
70         vec.push_back(*tmpGetSet);
71 
72         delete tmpGetSet;
73     }
74     for (int i = 0; i < vec.size(); i++) {
75         cout << "you're name is " << vec[i].getName() << " and your number is " << vec[i].getNum() << endl;
76         sleep(1);
77     }
78 }
79 
80 void fun::curTime() {
81     struct tm * timeinfo;
82     time_t timer;
83 
84     time(&timer);
85     timeinfo = localtime(&timer);
86     cout << "Current local time is " << asctime(timeinfo) << endl;
87 }
